publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5847 Jim Mather: The Renewables Obligation (Scotland) Amendment Order 2010—That the Economy, Energy and Tourism Committee recommends that the Renewables Obligation (Scotland) Amendment Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*
